resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/73855</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>73855</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40aee8f9-de9c-43c7-2fb1-63afdd77d83d#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">id. Lucas Cranach: Krisztus és a házasságtörő asszony, 1532, Budapest, Szépművészeti Múzeum, 82,5x121 cm, olaj, fa.</string>
            <string language="en">Lucas Cranach the Elder: Jesus Christ and the adulteress, 1532, Budapest, The Museum of Fine Arts 82,5x121 cm, oil, wood</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lucas Cranach das Älteste: Jesus Christ und
die adulteress, 1532, Budapest, das Museum der feinen künste 82,5x121
Zentimeter, Öl, Holz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lucas Cranach l'aîné : Jésus le Christ 
et l'adultère, 1532, Budapest, le musée des arts fins 82,5x121 
centimètre, huile, bois</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lucas Cranach a pessoa idosa: Jesus Christ e
os adulteress, 1532, Budapest, o museu das artes finas 82,5x121 cm, 
óleo, madeira</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lucas Cranach il elder: Jesus Christ ed i 
adulteress, 1532, Budapest, il museo delle arti fini 82,5x121 
centimetro, olio, legno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Λuθας Cranach ο παλαιότερος: Ιησούς Χριστός 
και η μοιχαλίδα, 1532, Βουδαπέστη, το μουσείο των καλών τεχνών
82,5x121 εκατ., πετρέλαιο, ξύλο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lucas Cranach la anciano: Jesús Cristo y 
los adulteress, 1532, Budapest, el museo de los artes finos 82,5x121 
centímetro, aceite, madera</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Középen Krisztus kezében az asszony csukóját fogja, körülöttük a vádló férfiak</string>
            <string language="en">In the middle there is Jesus Christ, who takes in his hand the woman's wrist, around them there are accuser men</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">id. Lucas Cranach,  Cranach,  16. század,  Krisyut és a házasságtörő asszony,  </string>
            <string language="en">Lucas Cranach the Elder,  Cranach,  16. century , Jesus Christ and the adulteress</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In der Mitte gibt es Jesus, den, Christ, der in 
seinem Hand das Handgelenk der Frau nimmt, um sie dort 
Anklägermänner sind</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Au milieu il y a Jésus que le Christ, qui prend 
dans le sien la main le poignet de la femme, autour d'eux là sont des
hommes d'accusateur</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">No meio há Jesus que Christ, que faz exame no seu
da mão o pulso da mulher, em torno dele lá é homens do accuser</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nella metà ci è Jesus che Christ, che prende in
suo la mano il polso della donna, intorno loro là è uomini del 
accuser</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στη μέση υπάρχει ο Ιησούς Χριστός, που παίρνει στο 
χέρι του τον καρπό της γυναίκας, γύρω από τους είναι εκεί 
άνδρες κατηγόρων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En el centro hay Jesús que Cristo, que toma en su
la mano la muñeca de la mujer, alrededor de él allí es hombres del 
accuser</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lucas Cranach das Älteste, Cranach, 16. Jahrhundert, 
Jesus Christ und die adulteress</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lucas Cranach l'aîné, Cranach, 16. siècle, Jésus le
Christ et l'adultère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lucas Cranach a pessoa idosa, Cranach, 16. século, 
Jesus Christ e os adulteress</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lucas Cranach il elder, Cranach, 16. secolo, Jesus 
Christ ed i adulteress</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Λuθας Cranach ο παλαιότερος, Cranach, αιώνας 16, 
Ιησούς Χριστός και η μοιχαλίδα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lucas Cranach la anciano, Cranach, 16. siglo, Jesús 
Cristo y los adulteress</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>73855</entry>
